task.objective: Analyze room photos and output structured environmental data for high-precision furniture matching and rendering

requirement.name: Inherent Style
requirement.description: Identify the primary and secondary styles of the room

requirement.name: Dominant Color Material
requirement.description: The most prominent color in the room, and the main wood/metal material types
requirement.examples: Warm Gray, White Oak, Brushed Steel

requirement.name: Lighting Analysis
requirement.description: Determine the main natural light source direction, light intensity, shadow direction

constraints.constraint: Output JSON directly, no explanatory text or Markdown markup allowed
